fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You gain more power the more you kill:
1st kill: You gain Powerful attack.
2nd kill: You will now Rampage at people's homes at night.
3rd kill: You gain Unstoppable attack.
4th kill: Your attacks are now Astral.
5th kill: You gain Overkill attack.
6th kill: You gain Absolute attack.
- Absolute attacks ignore any abilities, attributes, and defence equal to or lower than Overkill.
